div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 4386001 (Bronchospasm)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 9826008 (Conjunctivitis)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 23924001 (Pressure in chest)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 24079001 (Atopic dermatitis)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 31996006 (Vasculitis)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 39579001 (Anaphylaxis)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 41291007 (Angioedema)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 43116000 (Eczema)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 49727002 (Cough)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 51599000 (Edema of larynx)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 62315008 (Diarrhea)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 70076002 (Rhinitis)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 73442001 (Stevens-Johnson syndrome)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 76067001 (Sneezing)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 91175000 (Seizure)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 126485001 (Urticaria)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 162290004 (Dry eyes)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 195967001 (Airway hyperreactivity)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 247472004 (Weal)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 267036007 (Dyspnea)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 271757001 (Papular eruption)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 271759003 (Bullous eruption)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 271807003 (Eruption)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 410430005 (Cardiorespiratory arrest (disorder))
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 418363000 (Itching of skin (finding))
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 422400008 (Vomiting (disorder))
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 422587007 (Nausea (finding))
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 698247007 (Arrhythmia)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 702809001 (DRESS syndrome)
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 768962006 (Lyell syndrome (disorder))
Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 781682005 (Bloodshot eye)

description.value:
IPS allergy reaction value set. This value set includes a set of SNOMED CT codes and descendants (all top level codes are included in the SNOMED CT IPS Terminology) that may be used to represent allergy or intolerance reactions.
SNOMED CT® ECL definition:\ \<\< 4386001 |Bronchospasm (finding)| OR \<\< 9826008 |Conjunctivitis (disorder)| OR \<\< 23924001 |Tight chest (finding)| OR \<\< 24079001 |Atopic dermatitis (disorder)| OR \<\< 31996006 |Vasculitis (disorder)| OR \<\< 39579001 |Anaphylaxis (disorder)| OR \<\< 41291007 |Angioedema (disorder)| OR \<\< 43116000 |Eczema (disorder)| OR \<\< 49727002 |Cough (finding)| OR \<\< 51599000 |Edema of larynx (disorder)| OR \<\< 62315008 |Diarrhea (finding)| OR \<\< 70076002 |Rhinitis (disorder)| OR \<\< 73442001 |Stevens-Johnson syndrome (disorder)| OR \<\< 76067001 |Sneezing (finding)| OR \<\< 91175000 |Seizure (finding)| OR \<\< 126485001 |Urticaria (disorder)| OR \<\< 162290004 |Dry eyes (finding)| OR \<\< 195967001 |Asthma (disorder)| OR \<\< 247472004 |Weal (disorder)| OR \<\< 267036007 |Dyspnea (finding)| OR \<\< 271757001 |Papular eruption (disorder)| OR \<\< 271759003 |Bullous eruption (disorder)| OR \<\< 271807003 |Eruption of skin (disorder)| OR \<\< 410430005 |Cardiorespiratory arrest (disorder)| OR \<\< 418363000 |Itching of skin (finding)| OR \<\< 422400008 |Vomiting (disorder)| OR \<\< 422587007 |Nausea (finding)| OR \<\< 698247007 |Cardiac arrhythmia (disorder)| OR \<\< 702809001 |Drug reaction with eosinophilia and systemic symptoms (disorder)| OR \<\< 768962006 |Lyell syndrome (disorder)| OR \<\< 781682005 |Hyperemia of eye (finding)|
